forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 60, with temperatures falling to around 57 in the afternoon. West wind around 7 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Slight Chance Drizzle
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle after 4am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 49. South southwest wind 2 to 6 mph.

weather_report:
This evening, Downtown San Francisco greets us with a clear sky, the remnants of the day holding onto a gentle dusk, painting the horizons with a soft golden hue. As the temperatures slide slowly from their afternoon peak, a mild and crisp 57 degrees lingers, accompanied by a light west wind whispering through the streets. The tranquility of the scene belies that a shift is imminent — a subtle promise of drizzle in the early hours, signaling a gentle embrace from the clouds above. 

Given the relatively serene conditions, a light jacket is advisable for those venturing out into the cool evening air. The absence of fog is a charming surprise, offering unguarded views of the iconic skyline and perhaps even an invitation to stroll along the waterfront or visit a quaint café tucked away in the neighborhoods. As twilight descends, take a moment to savor a warm drink outdoors or explore the lively art scene — a perfect way to relish in the beauty of a San Francisco evening.
